overview:
Ingo Sesemann, Chief Financial Officer, member of the board of directors of Nero AG and managing director of Nero Development and Services GmbH and Nero EMEA Sales GmbH, joined Nero in July 2012. He is responsible for Finance, Human Resources, Customer Support, IT and Facilities.

Prior to joining Nero, Sesemann served for 14 years as Commercial Director at COR&FJA AG, a publicly listed company with more than 1,100 employees, which is one of Europe’s leading software and consulting companies for the insurance- and banking sectors. During his tenure, he was in charge of accounting and controlling, investor relations, M&A and company organization. For five years, he also served as head of human resources.

Before this time, he was head of accounting and controlling at a Value Added Reseller for IT-hardware for two years, after being branch-controller of a system vendor in the data-network-technology business for four years.

Sesemann holds a degree in Business Administration and is an investment analyst with DVFA/CEFA certification.
